title: I was just recently at a meeting at Cape Fear Public Utilities and asked them if they were a private company or were they a government runned company. They could not explain what they were. We also asked them if they were regulated by anyone and they said that they were not regulated by the state, county or the city. Whats up with that?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=968
